name: Chrono Crate
description:
Chrono crates are mysterious boxes that control the flow of time itself. Use the power to stop or restore time to overcome challenges and dodge obstacles.

Made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 5 (theme: Fast & Slow)

Controls

Arrow keys — move

Z — jump

X — pick up/throw objects

Enter — pause/change the color palette

R — restart the level

Credits

Art & coding: @FeatureKreep
